description: Detects Too long PowerShell command lines Author: oscd.community, Natalia Shornikova. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Too Long PowerShell Commandlines
query: ((process.command_line:(*powershell* OR *pwsh*) OR winlog.event_data.Description:"Windows\ Powershell" OR Product:"PowerShell\ Core\ 6") AND process.command_line:/.{1000,}/)
